description:
Subaru visits a certain doujinshi expo and finds Rem sitting at a booth, selling a book she wrote.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Re: Petit - Re: Petit kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Petit 7 - Zero kara
